sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react' import {Box, Tooltip, Button, Text} from '@chakra-ui/react' export default function SideBar() { const [search, setSearch] = useState("") const [searchResult, setSearchResult] = useState([]) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const [loadingChat, setLoadingChat] = useState(false) return ( <> ChatBuddy ) }
